<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/llvm-shutdown-obj">llvm&#95;shutdown&#95;obj</a> - This is a simple helper class that calls <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac27f7fe6f1543ef516aa0998bad20335">llvm&#95;shutdown()</a> when it is destroyed. <a href="#details">More...</a>
